title: Bryant McFadden on rookie QBs, helmet rule problems (Football 08/21)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Bryant McFadden of CBS Sports HQ to break down the latest preseason action, including how the rookie quarterbacks looked and if the NFL has a problem on its hands with the new helmet rule and the roughing the passer setup. They also talk about what the Jets should do with Teddy Bridgewater, and Will breaks down the Ravens-Colts game as well as news from around the NFL.
